header.name: chaos/preprocessor/array/to_string.h
header.author: Paul Mensonides
header.overview: The header defines a macro that converts an to a .

macro.abstract: The macro converts an to a .
macro.para: This macro expands to a containing the elements of array.
The array argument must be an containing no more than elements.

A may only contain letters, digits, and underscores. This macro makes no attempt to verify that the resulting is actually a valid .
((2, (+, -))) // invalid
